alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 4:48PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Johns, northeastern Putnam, east central Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 515 PM EST... At 448 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sawgrass to 6 miles south of World Golf Village to San Mateo. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Palatka, Hastings, East Palatka, Ponte Vedra Beach, Jacksonville Beach, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland and Nocatee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
